scenes.beat: Mei watches Lin tend flowers from her bedroom patio at Lu Xian, eyes filled with mystery longing.

frames.camera_position: wide from latticed window overlooking courtyard
frames.prompt: Camera positioned in extreme wide embrace from the latticed window of the bedroom patio, capturing the full sweep of the courtyard below where Lin kneels amid buckets of blooming peonies and lotuses, his weathered hands delicately pruning stems with fingers callused from years of toil, micro-tension in the subtle flex of his knuckles as petals drift like forgotten promises onto pressed earth; depth layers chain from foreground buckets brimming with dew-kissed blossoms in soft focus, sharpening to Lin's simple cotton robes frayed at hems from daily wear, rising to the wooden pavilion eaves etched with faint cracks from seasonal rains, dissolving into hazy distant mountains under vast sky; morning light filters through latticed shadows, casting elongated filigrees across Lin's kind eyes crinkled in concentration, gilding petal edges in gold while pooling soft umbers in the dirt hollows; textures reveal cotton weave roughened by sun and soil, wooden buckets splintered with use, earth compacted bearing imprints of countless footsteps, jade-green leaves veined with silver dew; Mei's silhouette haunts the upper frame edge, pale hand gripping sill, her gaze a distant anchor pulling the scene taut with unspoken yearning. Silk cushions in background recede into ivory haze, lacquered vanity reflecting fractured light. Chin tilted slightly, Lin pauses, unaware, breath syncing with breeze rustling blooms; ; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, dawn-piercing sunlight, 35mm film grain

frames.camera_position: close on Mei's face from patio edge
frames.prompt: Camera at medium close-up, three-quarter angle from camera left at arm's length on Mei's pale face framed by dark hair pinned with jade combs, her melancholic eyes filled with mystery longing fixed downward through lattice toward Lin, eyelids heavy with micro-tension of unshed tears, lips parted in silent breath as if whispering to the wind; depth layers from foreground jade pin glinting with captured sunlight, her embroidered collar of hanfu silk occupying lower third in razor focus showing thread pulls from wear, beyond to latticed window slats casting shadow grids on cheek, paper screens in cream haze receding; sunlight active as golden shafts piercing lattice, illuminating porcelain skin with ethereal glow, carving hollows under eyes into subtle shadows of inner turmoil, hair strands haloed; textures intimate: silk collar crosshatch weave imperfect at seams, jade smooth but etched faintly by touch, skin pores faint like rice paper, lips chapped from contemplative sighs; courtyard below blurs into floral impressionism, Lin's form a distant smudge of motion. Fingertips press lacquer sill, nails bitten short, body leaning imperceptibly forward, heart's weight in every quiver; ; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, latticed morning light, 35mm film grain

frames.camera_position: medium from behind Mei toward courtyard
frames.prompt: Camera in medium shot positioned behind Mei's shoulder, looking past her cascading dark hair toward the courtyard window, her hanfu silk robe waist-up in focus with arms folded subtly tense, micro-tension in shoulders rounded against chill breeze carrying floral scent; depth layers chain silk robe texture in foreground sharp, jade ornaments dangling into soft focus, window lattice midpoint crystalline, Lin tending flowers below in compressed depth with buckets framing his form; daylight pours horizontally, lantern remnants from night casting faint amber counterpoint, but sun dominates, burnishing Mei's hair to raven gloss, throwing courtyard into vibrant jade and ivory contrast; materials worn: hanfu silk raw with visible weave imperfections pulling at seams, lacquer sill scarred by rings, paper beyond rippled from humidity; Lin's hands visible distant, gentle on petals, her gaze bridges the gap like invisible thread. Breath held, chin lifted toward lattice, unfocused on his dedication; ; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, courtyard daylight glow, 35mm film grain
